Interface Norm<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceFunction<O>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O>
    Abstract interface for a mathematical norm.
